Today’s 50% discount marks the return of the lowest price we first tracked for it during the holiday sale last month, so be sure to snag it now if you missed it earlier.

Buy for $20 (Reg. $26)

What we love

Unlike most power strips that are chunky and awkward to place, this one keeps things slim at just 0.7 inches thick. It uses a clever pop-up outlet design, so the sockets extend only when you need them and sit flush when they’re not in use. You also get a solid mix of ports here in addition to four AC outlets – two USB-A, and two USB-C ports for everyday devices.

This newer unit carries a $2,899 MSRP since hitting the market at the end of September, but has been spending a considerable amount of time down at $1,499, with occasional spikes up to its full price and one-time falls lower to $1,424 during Black Friday/Cyber Monday and the $1,359 low from a New Year flash sale. With the bonus savings you’re scoring the next-best deal we have tracked behind that flash offer, cutting $1,500 off the full rate for the second-lowest price we have tracked.
